query:
SELECT
                p.medication_name,
                p.generic_name,
                m.atc_code
            FROM prescriptions p
            LEFT JOIN medications m ON LOWER(m.name) = LOWER(p.medication_name)
                OR LOWER(m.generic_name) = LOWER(p.medication_name)
            WHERE p.patient_id = $1
              AND p.status = 'ACTIVE'
